text: Hi sorry for the delay but we updated both require_css and jss to now take in additional key value pairs and place them in the render result! So `{{ require_css("./path/to/file.css", {"async":true,"id":"css-id", "media":"screen and (min-width: 769px)") }}` should work now

Reminder: Friendly reminder - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|submit your ideas to the idea forum> and post the link here with your idea. The votes for a feature help HubSpotters understand the demand. Thank you for all of your awesome ideas and feedback, we are listening and appreciate it.
